content.question: Which of the following are steps in providing psychological first aid? (Select all that apply)

answers.option: Look: Assess who needs help and prioritize.
Listen: Actively hear the person and show support.
Link: Connect them to family, friends, or professional help.
Ignore: Wait until the person calms down by themselves.

content.correct: Correct! Look, Listen, and Link are the key steps of PFA.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answers are: Look, Listen, Link.
